content.text:
To add another example, many folks (like myself) use the `.io` TLD but we aren't  actually based in the Indian Ocean.

I distinctly remember that the `nic` subdomain on any TLD is meant to take you to their info page (e.g. http://nic.io or http://nic.org) but I tried http://nic.to and it's just an empty WordPress site. Hmm. Also, http://nic.nz redirects to a www subdomain but that fails. Maybe it's not actually required to maintain that nic domain?
